body.p:
Transcription: Hād̠ā dīwān al-šayħ al-imām al-ˤālim
al-ˤallāma quṭb al-ˤārifīn wa-imām
al-muḥaqqaqīn wa-murabbī al-murīdīn
wa-mufīd al-ṭālibīn Abū
Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn
Burhān al-Dīn ibn
Muḥammad ibn Bahādur
ibn Aḥmad
ibn Zuqqā
ˤa
Aˤāda allāhu ˤalaynā min barakātihi wa-ˤalā al-muslimīn āmīn

Translation: This is the divan of the sheikh, the learned imam, the most erudite, the highest-ranking among the experts, the imam of the certain, the teacher of the seekers, and the helper of the students

Transcription: T̠umma malakahu al-faqīr al-ḥāǧǧ
Ibrāhīm ibn al-šayħ Muṣṭafā
ibn al-ḥāǧǧ Ibrāhīm al-ˤaṭṭār
fī niṣf Muḥarram sanat 1167
Translation: It then came into the possession of the poor ḥāǧǧ Ibrāhīm ibn al-šayħ Muṣṭafā / ibn al-ḥāǧǧ Ibrāhīm al-ˤAṭṭār halfway through Muharram in the year 1167

Transcription: Min kutub al-ˤabd al-muftaqir ilā raḥmat rabbihi
al-qadīr al-mannān al-Bahnasī ˤUt̠mān
ˤafā ˤanhu
Translation: Among the books of the servant in need of God's blessings, the almighty, the merciful, ˤUt̠mān al-Bahnasī, may [God] have mercy on him

Transcription: Naẓara fīhi wa-taˀammala fī maˤānīhi
al-ˤabd al-faqīr al-muˤtarif
bi-l-d̠anb wa-l-taqṣīr
Husayn
ˤafā allāhu ˤanhu
wa-ˤan iħwānihi al-muslimīn
aǧmaˤīn āmīn
Translation: Read and meditated upon by the poor servant, admitting to his sins and shortcomings, Husayn, may God have mercy on him and on his Muslim brothers, amen.
